Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.common

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientConnectionHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerGameContext
    public interface Server
extends ClientConnectionHandler
    An interface that specifies a server instance that's capable of processing Client actions.
